        <script type="text/javascript">
            var gadget = mixios.application.newGadget('http://mixitest.communityfactory.net', 'dynamite');
            gadget.enableDebug(true);
            
            gadget.registerOnLoadHandler(embedFlash);
            
            function getUserID() {
                return gadget.getOwnerId() + '*' + gadget.getViewerId();
            }
            
            function embedFlash() {
                var opt = {
                    id : 'dynamite',
                    flashvars : 'gadgetURL=' + gadget.getHost() + '/ajax/opendynamite/gadgetload',
                    allowScriptAccess: 'always',
                    height: 210,
                    width: 210,
                    allowFullScreen : false
                };
    
                gadgets.flash.embedFlash(gadget.getHost() + '/static/apps/dynamite/swf/gadget.swf?verson=2', gadget.getContainerId(), 8.0, opt);
            }
            
            //start
            gadget.start();
